|  [swapIndices(src, dest)](./ecs.component.swapindices.md) |  | Swaps slots of <code>src</code> &amp; <code>dest</code> indices. The given args are NOT keys, but indices in the <code>dense</code> array. The corresponding sparse &amp; value slots are swapped too. Returns true if swap happened (false, if <code>src</code> and <code>dest</code> are equal) |
